portCHAR stack_service_init (  stack_event_t  stack_event,
sock_handler_func  stack_event_handler,
uint8_t  gateway_discover,
gateway_cache_t *  gw_table
) 
 

Stack service init.

Init stack event bus using message queue or callback function. Also init automatick GW tracking.

Parameters:
stack_event pointer for stack evet message queue, give NULL if want use function callback
stack_event_handler handler for stack event callback if want poll message queue give NULL
gateway_discover boolean value for GW tracking, 1 enable automatick tarcking then have to give pointer for GW-table
gw_table pointer to global GW-table to application, give NULL if
Returns:
pdFALSE service initialize fail

pdTRIE Initilize complete
